text:
I’m trying to setup a local dev environment for the first time, following the instructions on the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/developer-projects-setup|developer projects setup guide> when I create my personal access key, I have selected all available scopes when generating the key, yet when it is created, it doesn’t have the scopes mentioned as required in the article:
```developer.projects.write
developer.app_functions.read and developer.app_functions.write```
I have a super admin account, and can’t see anywhere else I can enable those permissions on my account – is there some setting or a step that I’m missing somewhere?
